id(String) - Method in class com.globaltcad.swingtree.UIForAbstractSwing
This method exposes a concise way to set an identifier for the component wrapped by this UI! In essence this is simply a delegate for the Component.setName(String) method to make it more expressive and widely recognized what is meant ("id" is shorter and makes more sense than "name" which could be confused with "title").

U - com.globaltcad.swingtree.input.Keyboard.Key
 
UI - Class in com.globaltcad.swingtree
This class is a static API for exposing swing tree builder types for wrapping and assembling various JComponent types to form a UI tree.

Vertical or horizontal alignment.
UI.Cursor - Enum in com.globaltcad.swingtree
An enum set of all the available swing cursors which map to the cursor type id.
